sentence: He will likely be facing off against former pro-football player and prominent Trump supporter Herschel Walker in a state that Biden won narrowly in 2020.
author: Paul Bois
title: Vulnerable Democrats Distance from Joe Biden Ahead of Midterms

sentence: Former football star Herschel Walker, the GOP frontrunner, ended 2021 with roughly $5 million in the bank.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Warnock sets another fundraising record, ends quarter with $25.6M in the bank

sentence: The newly minted lawmaker is likely to face off against former professional football star Herschel Walker one of many Republican political newcomers Trump has endorsed in races around the country.
author: Warren Rojas
title: Sen. Raphael Warnock proposes slashing gas, drug, and shipping costs to beat inflation ahead of a midterm challenge from MAGA
